about_the_game:
Following a mysterious event on a fictional Southeast Asian island, the entire area has been placed under international quarantine. With most of the civilian population evacuated under the supervision of the United Nations, three PMC factions are tasked by their enigmatic clients to explore the region, uncover its secrets, and retrieve anything of value.

DEPLOY IN A LIVING OPEN-WORLD

Dive into the ultimate extraction shooter set in a vast 42km² open world of the Democratic Republic of Lamang, inspired by the stunning landscapes of Laos. As a PMC operator, embark on tactical missions to complete tasks, secure high-value loot, and survive intense FPS firefights against rival factions and AI enemies.

SURVIVE REALISTIC COMBAT

Prepare for an immersive combat experience where precise real-world ballistics make every shot count. A unique health system simulates the human body, with injuries affecting perception and performance, forcing you to diagnose wounds and apply the right treatments to survive and support your team.

UNRAVEL A MATURE STORY

Immerse yourself in a mature story experience as you uncover the mysteries of Lamang. Through numerous missions, encounter a colorful cast of morally complex characters, each hiding secrets and pursuing their own agendas. Navigate a web of lies, decide who to trust, and expose the truth in a world of shifting loyalties and gray morality.

THRIVE WITH YOUR ARSENAL

Create your ideal firearm by customizing hundreds of parts, mounts, and accessories to suit your playstyle perfectly. Adapt your tactical gear to tackle any challenge and unforeseen situations. In this high-stakes environment, every move matters, and every fight could result in losing your hard-earned gear and progress.

STANDARD EDITION EQUIPMENT AT START

Begin your journey and gear up for action with bonus equipment, a basic locker, and a lockbox.

Locker Size (10x25)

Secure Lockbox (2x2)

10000$ (in-game)

  • 1x Assault Rifle

  • 1x Pistol

  • 1x Knife

  • 1x Belt

  • 2x Pistol Magazines

  • 1x Backpack

  • 1x Water

  • 1x Combat Meal

  • 1x Bandage

  • 1x Tourniquet

  • 1x Surgery Kit

  • 1x Large Blood Bag

  • 1x Splint

  • 1x Painkillers

  • 1x Helmet

  • 1x Armor Plate Carrier

  • 3x Assault Rifle Magazines

Locker Contents

  • 2x Assault Rifles

  • 2x Pistols

  • 2x Stun Grenades

  • 6x Assault Rifle Magazines

  • 4x Pistol Magazines

  • 2x Collimators

  • 2x Flashlight Mounts

  • 2x Flashlights

  • 360x Assault Rifle Ammunition

  • 100x Pistol Rifle Ammunition

  • 2x Helmets

  • 2x Armor Plate Carriers

  • 2x Backpacks

  • 2x Belts

  • 2x Medkits

  • 2x Headsets

  • 2x Eyewear

  • 2x Hats

  • 2x Combat Meals

  • 2x Water

  • 2x Splints

  • 2x Surgery Kits

  • 4x Bandages

  • 2x Tourniquets

  • 2x Painkillers

  • 1x Large Blood Bag

  • 2xSmall Blood Bags

The equipment will be added to your character after every game reset.

The specific types of equipment may change in future resets.

Editions are upgradable, letting users upgrade by paying only the difference.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages or not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

detailed_description:
Game Editions

  • The equipment will be added to your character after every game reset.

  • The specific types of equipment may change in future resets.

  • Editions are upgradable, letting users upgrade by paying only the difference.


Just Updated

The Night Ops update introduces a day/night cycle, challenging players to adapt to shifting conditions with an accelerated 2:1 rhythm. Every mission becomes a trial of strategy, where the right tools—and the skill to use them—can mean the difference between victory and defeat.

Key Features: 

  • Day and Night Cycle 

  • Night Gear / NVGs

  • Tactical Devices 

  • High-Value Loot 

  • Reduced LZ Wait Times 

  • 7 New Weapons 

  • 22 New Tasks 

  • Locker Sorting 

  • New Storage Containers 

  • Faction Chat 

  • Reporting/Social Feature 

  • Revamped Tasks 

  • New Environmental Points 

  • Upgraded AI 

  • New Landing Zones Added 

  • Enhanced Health Panel 

  • Emote System 

  • Keys Spawning 

  • Faction Patches for Identifying Enemies 

In addition to these features, the update brings numerous quality-of-life improvements, bug fixes, and enhancements inspired by community feedback to make the experience even better.


Roadmap

*** Please note that the Roadmap is a work in progress and may be subject to change as development and community feedback evolves. ***

With only 20% of the design complete, the journey ahead is filled with potential and promise. Each new update brings us closer to refining the game with enhanced optimization, balance, and depth. As we continue to develop and expand, your feedback is crucial in shaping the future of Gray Zone Warfare. Stay with us as we build and evolve, ensuring that every step forward enhances your experience and brings new challenges to master. 

Every Move Matters, 

MADFINGER Games Team

name: Gray Zone Warfare

subs.option_text: Gray Zone Warfare - Tactical Edition Upgrade - $23.00 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (AVX2 support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8GB / 2060 SUPER 8GB / RTX 3060 8GB / RTX 4060 8GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 8GB / RX 6600 8GB / Intel® Arc™ A770 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) / Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

reviews:
“Tactical, immersive, technologically advanced, and brave.”
OperatorDrewski

“This game has a solid foundation that you can't find in damn near any other indie FPS that I have played and in almost anything that I have touched.”
BigfryTV

“The level designers need an award. This jungle looks incredible.”
LevelCapGaming
short_description: Gray Zone Warfare challenges you with the first open-world extraction shooter emphasizing realism. Deploy with a Private Military Company, survive high-stakes PvEvP or PvE MMO battles against human operators and AI enemies, unravel Lamang island’s mysteries, and thrive through hard-earned progress.
